text: Choe Byeong-chan (born 4 April 1996) is an South Korean professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for K League 1 side Seongnam. ==Club career== Choe made his professional debut for Seongnam in the K League 2 on 1 April 2018 against Chungnam Asan. He started and played 42 minutes before being substituted off as Seongnam won 1–0. He then scored his first professional goal a month later on 12 May against Gwangju. His 39th minute goal was the second in a 3–1 victory. Choe then scored a brace for Seongnam on 30 June 2018 during a 2–1 victory over Bucheon 1995.
